lead_paragraph: The power failure disrupted service to 1.5 million utility customers, created massive traffic jams, and prompted the early closings of businesses

byline.contributor: Omaya Sosa contributed reporting from San Juan, P.R.

headline.print_headline: Puerto Rico Plant Fire Cuts Power
headline.main: Fire at Power Plant Leaves Puerto Rico in the Dark

snippet: The power failure disrupted service to 1.5 million utility customers, created massive traffic jams, and prompted the early closings of businesses...
abstract: Blackout in Puerto Rico disrupts electrical service to 1.5 million utility customers due to fire in Aguirre substation; Gov Alejandro Garcia Padilla says outage could last 24 hours.
